sentences.en: Each tale has the timeless quality of fable.
sentences.cn: 每个故事都有其永恒的寓意。

sentences.en: Great satire needs the sustenance of great fable.
sentences.cn: 伟大的讽刺作品需要伟大的怪异故事来滋养它.

sentences.en: He had some motive in telling this fable.
sentences.cn: 他讲这寓言故事是有用意的.

sentences.en: It was so clearly a moral fable.
sentences.cn: 显而易见,这是一篇道德寓言.

sentences.en: Such walls as in time may linger as a mere fable.
sentences.cn: 这类高墙到将来只会给后代当作闲话当年的资料罢了.

sentences.en: Tell them the fable about the fox and the grapes.
sentences.cn: 告诉他们那个狐狸与葡萄的寓言吧.

sentences.en: The course is about fable and legend in modern literature.
sentences.cn: 这门课专讲现代文学中的神话和传奇作品.

sentences.en: The fable is given on the next page.
sentences.cn: 这篇寓言登在下一页上.

sentences.en: the fable of the fox and the crow
sentences.cn: 狐狸和乌鸦的寓言故事

sentences.en: The old fable continues to echo down the centuries.
sentences.cn: 这则古老的寓言流传了数个世纪。

sentences.en: This fable was written after the manner of Aesop.
sentences.cn: 这部寓言是仿照《伊索寓言》写成的.

sentences.en: We could not decide if it was fact or fable.
sentences.cn: 我们无法确定这究竟是事实还是无稽之谈.

sentences.en: We have to learn to distinguish fact from fable.
sentences.cn: 我们应当学会识别真伪.

sentences.en: Worked had only then known that, the original elimination exploitation only was one kind of fable.
sentences.cn: 工作了才知道，原来消灭剥削只是一种传说。

sentences.en: You excuse me, I daresay, but you remind me of that fable.
sentences.cn: 请原谅我这样问你, 但我敢说, 你使我想起了那则寓言.

words.tran_cn: 难以置信的；传说的，寓言中的；极好的

trans.tran_en: a traditional short story that teaches a moral lesson, especially a story about animals
